arts.sum: Wolves were controlling the game well and had another chance when Jorgen Strand Larsen was on the stretch but still forced Travers into a save, as they took their lead into half-time. They booked their place in the next round with a fantastic late goal from Tolu Arokodare - his first for the club - to add shine to the win.

arts.ttl: Vitor Pereira happy to have the smiles back as Wolves beat Everton
arts.sum: Pereira’s side have lost all five of their league games this season but are through to the last 16 of the Carabao Cup.

arts.ttl: Pereira's persistent Wolves take revenge against Everton in EFL Cup victory
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira's Wolverhampton Wanderers earn a rare win as they beat Premier League rivals Everton 2-0 in the EFL Cup at Molineux on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Everton, Carabao Cup: Player Ratings - Rotations and scrappy performances lead to cup exit
arts.sum: Everton have been knocked out of the Carabao Cup after a 2-0 defeat to Wolves at Molineux Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wolves brush off winless league record to beat Everton in the Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Wolves have won both of their cup games this season while losing all five Premier League outings.

arts.ttl: Wolves through with two-goal win over Toffees
arts.sum: Wolves shrugged off their poor Premier League form with a 2-0 win over Everton at Molineux in the third round of the Carabao Cup.

arts.ttl: Carabao Cup LIVE: Liverpool v Southampton, Lincoln City vs Chelsea, plus six more games - scores & updates
arts.sum: Follow build-up, Team news, score, radio and live text updates.
